\chapter{Methods}


## Hierachical Poisson Normal model

### Fomulation

\begin{subequations}
  \begin{alignat}{2}
    Y_{t}^{a}|u_{t}^{a} &\sim \mathrm{Pois} \big( w_{t}^{a} \lambda_{a} \exp(u_{t}^{a}) \big) \label{eq:pois_ln0} \\ 
    u_{t}^{a} &\sim \mathrm{N}(0,\sigma^2) \label{eq:pois_ln1}
  \end{alignat}
\end{subequations}
